verses.verse: וַיָּ֡קָם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kom rose up אֶלְיָשִׁיב֩ <WH475> 'el-ya-Shiv Then Eliashib הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol the high וְאֶחָ֣יו <WH251> ve-'e-Chav with his brethren הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim, the priests וַיִּבְנוּ֙ <WH1129> vai-yiv-Nu and they builded אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> hatz-Tzon, the sheep הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah they קִדְּשׁ֔וּהוּ <WH6942> kid-de-Shu-hu, they sanctified וַֽיַּעֲמִ֖ידוּ <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mi-du it and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֑יו <WH1817> dal-to-Tav; the doors וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against מִגְדַּ֤ל <WH4026> mig-Dal of it even unto the tower הַמֵּאָה֙ <WH3968> ham-me-'Ah of Meah קִדְּשׁ֔וּהוּ <WH6942> kid-de-Shu-hu, they sanctified עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad against מִגְדַּ֥ל <WH4026> mig-Dal it unto the tower חֲנַנְאֵֽל׃ <WH2606> cha-nan-'El. of Hananeel ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and יָד֥וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do And next unto him בָנ֖וּ <WH1129> va-Nu builded אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> 'an-Shei the men יְרֵח֑וֹ <WH3405> ye-re-Cho; of Jericho ס sa-Mek וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do Next בָנָ֔ה <WH1129> va-Nah, And next to them builded זַכּ֖וּר <WH2139> zak-Kur Zaccur בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אִמְרִֽי׃ <WH566> 'im-Ri. of Imri ס sa-Mek

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate הַדָּגִ֔ים <WH1709> had-da-Gim, But the fish בָּנ֖וּ <WH1129> ba-Nu build בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei did the sons הַסְּנָאָ֑ה <WH5570> has-se-na-'Ah; of Hassenaah הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah they קֵר֔וּהוּ <WH7136> ke-Ru-hu, who [also] laid the beams וַֽיַּעֲמִ֙ידוּ֙ <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mi-du thereof and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <WH1817> dal-to-Tav, the doors מַנְעוּלָ֖יו <WH4514> man-'u-Lav thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָֽיו׃ <WH1280> u-ve-ri-Chav. thereof and the bars ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and יָדָ֣ם <WH3027> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֗יק <WH2388> he-che-Zik, repaired מְרֵמ֤וֹת <WH4822> me-re-Mot Meremoth בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אוּרִיָּה֙ <WH223> 'u-ri-Yah of Urijah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son הַקּ֔וֹץ <WH6976> hak-Kotz, of Koz ס sa-Mek וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and יָדָ֣ם <WH3027> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֔יק <WH2388> he-che-Zik, repaired מְשֻׁלָּ֥ם <WH4918> me-shul-Lam Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son בֶּרֶכְיָ֖ה <WH1296> be-rech-Yah of Berechiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מְשֵׁיזַבְאֵ֑ל <WH4898> me-shei-zav-'El; of Meshezabeel ס sa-Mek וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and יָדָ֣ם <WH3027> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶֽחֱזִ֔יק <WH2388> he-che-Zik, repaired צָד֖וֹק <WH6659> tza-Dok Zadok בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> ben- the son בַּעֲנָֽא׃ <WH1195> ba-'a-Na. of Baana ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- unto יָדָ֖ם <WH3027> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֣יקוּ <WH2388> he-che-Zi-ku repaired הַתְּקוֹעִ֑ים <WH8621> hat-te-ko-'Im; the Tekoites וְאַדִּֽירֵיהֶם֙ <WH117> ve-'ad-di-rei-Hem but their nobles לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not הֵבִ֣יאוּ <WH935> he-Vi-'u put צַוָּרָ֔ם <WH6677> tzav-va-Ram, not their necks בַּעֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> ba-'a-vo-Dat to the work אֲדֹנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH113> 'a-do-nei-Hem. of their Lord ס sa-Mek

וְאֵת֩ <WH853> ve-'Et שַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate הַיְשָׁנָ֜ה <WH3465> hay-sha-Nah Moreover the old הֶחֱזִ֗יקוּ <WH2388> he-che-Zi-ku, repaired יֽוֹיָדָע֙ <WH3111> yo-ya-Da' Jehoiada בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son פָּסֵ֔חַ <WH6454> pa-Se-ach, of Paseah וּמְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <WH4918> u-me-shul-Lam and Meshullam בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son בְּסֽוֹדְיָ֑ה <WH1152> be-sod-Yah; of Besodeiah הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah they קֵר֔וּהוּ <WH7136> ke-Ru-hu, they laid the beams וַֽיַּעֲמִ֙ידוּ֙ <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mi-du thereof and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <WH1817> dal-to-Tav, the doors וּמַנְעֻלָ֖יו <WH4514> u-man-'u-Lav thereof and the locks וּבְרִיחָֽיו׃ <WH1280> u-ve-ri-Chav. thereof and the bars ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- unto יָדָ֨ם <WH3027> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֜יק <WH2388> he-che-Zik repaired מְלַטְיָ֣ה <WH4424> me-lat-Yah Melatiah הַגִּבְעֹנִ֗י <WH1393> hag-giv-'o-Ni, the Gibeonite וְיָדוֹן֙ <WH3036> ve-ya-dOn and Jadon הַמֵּרֹ֣נֹתִ֔י <WH4824> ham-me-Ro-no-Ti, the Meronothite אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> 'an-Shei the men גִבְע֖וֹן <WH1391> giv-'on of Gibeon וְהַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <WH4709> ve-ham-mitz-Pah; and of Mizpah לְכִסֵּ֕א <WH3678> le-chis-Se unto the throne פַּחַ֖ת <WH6346> pa-Chat of the governor עֵ֥בֶר <WH5676> 'E-ver on this side הַנָּהָֽר׃ <WH5104> han-na-Har. the river ס sa-Mek

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do Next unto him הֶחֱזִ֗יק <WH2388> he-che-Zik, repaired עֻזִּיאֵ֤ל <WH5816> 'uz-zi-'El Uzziel בֶּֽן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חַרְהֲיָה֙ <WH2736> char-ha-Yah of Harhaiah צֽוֹרְפִ֔ים <WH6884> tzor-Fim, of the goldsmiths ס sa-Mek וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- unto יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do Next unto him הֶחֱזִ֔יק <WH2388> he-che-Zik, also repaired חֲנַנְיָ֖ה <WH2608> cha-nan-Yah Hananiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son הָרַקָּחִ֑ים <WH7546> ha-rak-ka-Chim; of [one of] the apothecaries וַיַּֽעַזְבוּ֙ <WH5800> vai-ya-'az-Vu and they fortified יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-Ru-sha-Lim, Jerusalem עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad far הַחוֹמָ֥ה <WH2346> ha-cho-Mah wall הָרְחָבָֽה׃ <WH7342> ha-re-cha-Vah. unto the broad ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- Next יָדָ֤ם <WH3027> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶחֱזִיק֙ <WH2388> he-che-Zik repaired רְפָיָ֣ה <WH7509> re-fa-Yah Rephaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son ח֔וּר <WH2354> Chur, of Hur שַׂ֕ר <WH8269> sar the ruler חֲצִ֖י <WH2677> cha-Tzi of the half פֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH6418> Pe-lech part יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- unto יָדָ֧ם <WH3027> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֛יק <WH2388> he-che-Zik repaired יְדָיָ֥ה <WH3042> ye-da-Yah Jedaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son חֲרוּמַ֖ף <WH2739> cha-ru-Maf of Harumaph וְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> ve-Ne-ged opposite בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> bei-To; even over against his house ס sa-Mek וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- unto יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do And next unto him הֶחֱזִ֔יק <WH2388> he-che-Zik, repaired חַטּ֖וּשׁ <WH2407> chat-Tush Hattush בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חֲשַׁבְנְיָֽה׃ <WH2813> cha-shav-ne-Yah. of Hashabniah

מִדָּ֣ה <WH4060> mid-Dah piece שֵׁנִ֗ית <WH8145> she-Nit, the other הֶחֱזִיק֙ <WH2388> he-che-Zik repaired מַלְכִּיָּ֣ה <WH4441> mal-ki-Yah Malchijah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son חָרִ֔ם <WH2766> cha-Rim, of Harim וְחַשּׁ֖וּב <WH2815> ve-chash-Shuv and Hashub בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son פַּחַ֣ת pa-Chat מוֹאָ֑ב <WH6355> mo-'Av; of Pahathmoab וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְדַּ֥ל <WH4026> mig-Dal and the tower הַתַּנּוּרִֽים׃ <WH8574> hat-tan-nu-Rim. of the furnaces ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- Next יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do And next unto him הֶחֱזִ֗יק <WH2388> he-che-Zik, repaired שַׁלּוּם֙ <WH7967> shal-Lum Shallum בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son הַלּוֹחֵ֔שׁ <WH3873> hal-lo-Chesh, of Halohesh שַׂ֕ר <WH8269> sar the ruler חֲצִ֖י <WH2677> cha-Tzi of the half פֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH6418> Pe-lech part יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he וּבְנוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1323> u-ve-no-Tav. he and his daughters ס sa-Mek

אֵת֩ <WH853> 'et שַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate הַגַּ֜יְא <WH1516> hag-Gay The valley הֶחֱזִ֣יק <WH2388> he-che-Zik repaired חָנוּן֮ <WH2586> cha-Nun Hanun וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> ve-yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants זָנוֹחַ֒ <WH2182> za-no-aCh of Zanoah הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah They בָנ֔וּהוּ <WH1129> va-Nu-hu, they built וַֽיַּעֲמִ֙ידוּ֙ <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mi-du it and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <WH1817> dal-to-Tav, the doors מַנְעֻלָ֖יו <WH4514> man-'u-Lav thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָ֑יו <WH1280> u-ve-ri-Chav; thereof and the bars וְאֶ֤לֶף <WH505> ve-'E-lef thereof and a thousand אַמָּה֙ <WH520> 'am-Mah cubits בַּחוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> ba-cho-Mah, on the wall עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad against שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate הָשֲׁפֽוֹת׃ <WH830> ha-sha-Fot. unto the dung

וְאֵ֣ת׀ <WH853> ve-'Et שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate הָאַשְׁפּ֗וֹת <WH830> ha-'ash-Pot, But the dung הֶחֱזִיק֙ <WH2388> he-che-Zik repaired מַלְכִּיָּ֣ה <WH4441> mal-ki-Yah Malchiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son רֵכָ֔ב <WH7394> re-Chav, of Rechab שַׂ֖ר <WH8269> sar the ruler פֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH6418> Pe-lech of part בֵּית־ beit- הַכָּ֑רֶם <WH1021> hak-Ka-rem; of Bethhaccerem ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu He יִבְנֶ֔נּוּ <WH1129> yiv-Nen-nu, he built וְיַעֲמִיד֙ <WH5975> ve-ya-'a-Mid it and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <WH1817> dal-to-Tav, the doors מַנְעֻלָ֖יו <WH4514> man-'u-Lav thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָֽיו׃ <WH1280> u-ve-ri-Chav. thereof and the bars ס sa-Mek

וְאֵת֩ <WH853> ve-'Et שַׁ֨עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar But the gate הָעַ֜יִן <WH5869> ha-'A-yin of the fountain הֶ֠חֱזִיק <WH2388> He-che-zik repaired שַׁלּ֣וּן <WH7968> shal-Lun Shallun בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son כָּל־ kol- חֹזֶה֮ <WH3626> cho-Zeh of Colhozeh שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> sar the ruler פֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH6418> Pe-lech of part הַמִּצְפָּה֒ <WH4709> ham-mitz-Pah of Mizpah ה֤וּא <WH1931> hu He יִבְנֶ֙נּוּ֙ <WH1129> yiv-Nen-nu he built וִיטַֽלְלֶ֔נּוּ <WH2926> vi-tal-Len-nu, it and covered; וְיַעֲמִידוּ ve-ya-'a-mi-du כוְיַעֲמִיד֙ <WH5975> ve-ya-'a-Mid abide קדַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <WH1817> dal-to-Tav, the doors מַנְעֻלָ֖יו <WH4514> man-'u-Lav thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָ֑יו <WH1280> u-ve-ri-Chav; thereof and the bars וְ֠אֵת <WH853> Ve-'et חוֹמַ֞ת <WH2346> cho-Mat thereof and the wall בְּרֵכַ֤ת <WH1295> be-re-Chat of the pool הַשֶּׁ֙לַח֙ <WH7975> hash-She-lach of Siloah לְגַן־ <WH1588> le-gan- garden הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech, by the king's וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- far הַֽמַּעֲל֔וֹת <WH4609> ham-ma-'a-Lot, and unto the stairs הַיּוֹרְד֖וֹת <WH3381> hai-yor-Dot that go down מֵעִ֥יר <WH5892> me-'Ir from the city דָּוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> da-Vid. of David ס sa-Mek

אַחֲרָ֤יו <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav After הֶחֱזִיק֙ <WH2388> he-che-Zik him repaired נְחֶמְיָ֣ה <WH5166> ne-chem-Yah Nehemiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son עַזְבּ֔וּק <WH5802> 'az-Buk, of Azbuk שַׂ֕ר <WH8269> sar the ruler חֲצִ֖י <WH2677> cha-Tzi of the half פֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH6418> Pe-lech part בֵּֽית־ beit- צ֑וּר <WH1049> Tzur; of Bethzur עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- far נֶ֙גֶד֙ <WH5048> ne-ged opposite קִבְרֵ֣י <WH6913> kiv-Rei unto [the place] over against the sepulchres דָוִ֔יד <WH1732> da-Vid, of David וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- far הַבְּרֵכָה֙ <WH1295> hab-be-re-Chah and to the pool הָעֲשׂוּיָ֔ה <WH6213> ha-'a-su-Yah, that was made וְעַ֖ד <WH5704> ve-'Ad far בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit and unto the house הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <WH1368> hag-gib-bo-Rim. of the mighty ס sa-Mek

אַחֲרָ֛יו <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav After הֶחֱזִ֥יקוּ <WH2388> he-che-Zi-ku him repaired הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim the Levites רְח֣וּם <WH7348> re-Chum Rehum בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son בָּנִ֑י <WH1137> ba-Ni; of Bani עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do Next unto him הֶחֱזִ֗יק <WH2388> he-che-Zik, repaired חֲשַׁבְיָ֛ה <WH2811> cha-shav-Yah Hashabiah שַׂר־ <WH8269> sar- the ruler חֲצִי־ <WH2677> cha-tzi- of the half פֶ֥לֶךְ <WH6418> Fe-lech part קְעִילָ֖ה <WH7084> ke-'i-Lah of Keilah לְפִלְכּֽוֹ׃ <WH6418> le-fil-Ko. in his part ס sa-Mek

אַחֲרָיו֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rav After הֶחֱזִ֣יקוּ <WH2388> he-che-Zi-ku him repaired אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <WH251> 'a-chei-Hem, their brethren בַּוַּ֖י <WH942> bav-Vai Bavai בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חֵנָדָ֑ד <WH2582> che-na-Dad; of Henadad שַׂ֕ר <WH8269> sar the ruler חֲצִ֖י <WH2677> cha-Tzi of the half פֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH6418> Pe-lech part קְעִילָֽה׃ <WH7084> ke-'i-Lah. of Keilah ס sa-Mek
